thread.section_title: Hotel Eclat Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A differentiated boutique hotel in a unique shopping mall
thread.title_full: A differentiated boutique hotel in a unique shopping mall - Review of Hotel Eclat Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Qinghong Y
title: A differentiated boutique hotel in a unique shopping mall
text: A hotel with a style. It's tastefully renovated and each floor has different decorations that are rarely seen in other business hotels located in a city center. Hotel staffs are well trained and remember me by name. Ms. Nicole Huang was particularly friendly and professional. My annoying questions were answered with patience. Highly recommended if you are looking for a unique experience in Beijing and always ending your day in a great bar.
